long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tag Game: A local multiplayer game of catch!

Welcome to Tag Unblocked Game! This is a local multiplayer game of catch that allows you to enjoy the thrill of chasing with your friends!

Key Features:

Multiplayer battles: Tag Unblocked Game supports multiplayer battles, allowing you to play with your friends. Invite your friends to join the game or team up with your family to experience thrilling and exciting chasing battles.

Customizable rules: The game provides options for customizable rules, allowing you to set the game rules according to your preferences and needs. You can set time limits, safe zones, special abilities, and more to make the game more fun and challenging.

Diverse environments: The game offers multiple different environments to choose from, such as parks, forests, cities, and more. Each environment has unique obstacles and hiding spots, adding more strategy and fun to the chase.

Exciting actions and abilities: In Tag Unblocked Game, you can use various actions and abilities to intensify the chase. Use a speed boost to catch up with your opponents, and use stealth abilities to evade pursuit, showcasing your agility and tactical thinking.

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
